name: For Madman Only
description:
Short 2D game based on the novel of Hermann Hesse "The Steppenwolf", developed in July 2019 by Dorota Wróblewska (Sparrow in the field). Game is form of artistic interactive story.  Graphics are black and white, hand drawn and animated what in combination with en excellent music by Wroblevsky&Wroblevsky Music written directly for this game, makes great, unique mood. 

It's platformer type game with point and click elements.
